Monster.Name: Beast of the Air
Monster.HPRoll: equal the beast’s Constitution modifier + your Wisdom modifier + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your ranger level)

MonsterTrait.Name: Flyby
MonsterTrait.Text: The beast doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

MonsterTrait.Name: Primal Rebirth
MonsterTrait.Text: If the beast has died within the last hour, you can use your action to touch it and expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its hit points restored.

MonsterTrait.Name: Ready Companion
MonsterTrait.Text: As a bonus action, you can command the beast to make its shred attack or to Hide.

MonsterAction.Name: Shred
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 slashing damage.
